Internal Rules

OpenWIS STEERING COMMITTEE

Contents

  1. Steering Committee Delegates

The responsibilities of the Steering Committee are set out in Article 13.

As stated in Article 13.1, each Member of Strategic Partner of the OpenWIS Association is represented on the Steering Committee by one Delegate of its own choosing. Also note that, as stated in Article 13.5, a chairperson (“SC Chair”) and vice-Chairperson (“SC Vice-Chair”) of the Steering Committee are elected from amongst the Delegates.

Steering Committee Delegates

  • Mr. TANDY Jeremy, Met Office (SC Chair)
  • Mr. LE GALLOU Loïc, Météo France International (SC Vice-Chair)
  • Mr. DELL’ACQUA Mattéo, Météo France
  • Mr. QU Weiqing, Bureau of Meteorology
  • Mr. LEE Okki, Korea Meteorological Administration
  • Mrs. SHEETS Kari, National Weather Service
  • Mr. VISA Mikko, Finnish Meteorological Institute
  • OpenWIS Association AISBL
